title: M8: Evaluating custom NMT engines
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: a reminder of where are metrics used during the whole process is done in the activity and could open a potential discussion.
